definition: ingredients (in a cooking recipe)/to mix materials according to directions
to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate

sentences.english: Maybe I'll finally learn to knit. Or cook something with more than three ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 也許我最終會學會編織，煮有三種以上配料的菜式。

sentences.english: Cookie packages list whole milk powder as an ingredient.
sentences.chinese: 餅乾包裝清單全脂奶粉作爲配料。

sentences.english: Indigo is a natural ingredient in blue.
sentences.chinese: 靛青是藍色的一種自然配料。

sentences.english: Her recipe is good because of the secret ingredient.
sentences.chinese: 她的烹飪方法很好，因爲裏面含有神祕的配料。

sentences.english: Therefore, dosing technology is a key link in the manufacturing procedure of welding rod.
sentences.chinese: 所以，配料工藝是電焊條生產過程中的重要環節。

sentences.english: Return eggs to the pot and add the rest of the ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 把雞蛋放回壺裏，放入其他的配料。

sentences.english: Pour the ingredients into a twenty-five cubic inch pan.
sentences.chinese: 再把這些配料倒進一個25立方英寸的平底鍋中。

sentences.english: Add the remaining ingredients and combine them well.
Giada says to put the first 7 ingredients in a bowl and whisk them together.
sentences.chinese: Giada說把前七種配料放在一個碗裏然後混合。

sentences.english: The deal also covers P& G's nutrition-enhancing food ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 該協議還包括寶潔的營養強化食品配料。

sentences.english: People should be free to use whatever ingredients they wish.
sentences.chinese: 人們應該能夠自由使用他們想要的任何配料。

sentences.english: You can put a lot of different pizza toppings on a pizza base.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在比薩餅底襯上加不同的頂配料。

sentences.english: The list of ingredients sounds very appetizing.
sentences.chinese: 這張單子上列的配料聽起來使人饞涎欲滴。

sentences.english: Then add the flour and mix all the ingredients together until smooth.
sentences.chinese: 然後加入麪粉，所有配料一起攪拌直到調勻。

sentences.english: In the cobb salad, you will find most of these ingredients chopped into cubes.
sentences.chinese: 在科布色拉里，你會發現大部分配料都被切成丁狀。

sentences.english: She levelled the surface of the cake mixture with a metal spatula.
sentences.chinese: 她用金屬鏟抹平了蛋糕配料。

definition: raw materials for making soup/packaged soup mix
to improve taste/to make sth palatable
